resources.string: Auto Report

Auto report the number if it\'s blocked by following reasons:

  - Non-Contacts
  - STIR/SHAKEN attestation
  - Number Regex

This doesn\'t impact manual reporting.
Parse CSV
Parse XML
Regex Extract

Parse csv data bytes to a list of numbers.

The column containing the numbers must be named <b><no_translate>pattern</no_translate></b>.

For third-party csv files with different header names, map them to <b><no_translate>pattern</no_translate></b> using the Column Mapping.

For example:
  { \"number_column_header\": \"pattern\" }

Note
For parsing plain text files without column headers, use Regex Extract instead.
Parse xml data bytes using <title>xpath</title> and generate a list of numbers.

Search for a regex pattern in text, find all occurrences and generate a list of numbers.

This can also be used to parse plain text files with one number per line.

For example, parse text:
  111
  222
  333
 with regex:
  (\\d+)
Send an HTTP request and retrieve the response as data bytes.
Export the current settings as data bytes.
Apply settings from data bytes.

Read data bytes from a file.

Supported path tags:

%s

Supported file name tags:

%s

Write data bytes to a file.

Supported path tags:

%s

Supported filename tags:

%s
Find Rules
Modify Rules
Find one or multiple regex rules that match a particular description.

Modify the attributes of one or more rules.

Depending on the workflow trigger type, rules can be modified permanently or temporarily.

Modifiable attributes:
- pattern
  The regex
- description
  The description
- priority
  The priority
- isBlacklist
  true: Block, false: allow
- flags
  Apply to:
  1: call, 2: SMS, 3: both, 0: disable
- channel
  The notification channel id string
- blockType
  0: reject, 1: silence, 2: hang-up
- simSlot
  0, 1, 2â€¦ Or null for any SIM.
Add a list of numbers to the spam database.
Import to Regex Rule
Generate a new regex rule from a list of numbers.
Replace Number

Normalize numeric patterns from third-party sources to regex format.

For example, to map
  +12345####
to
  12345....

Add two Replace Number actions:
  - Replace `(\\+)` with ``
  - Replace `(#)` with `.`
Duration (minutes)
Tap the <highlight>Test</highlight> button to manually run this workflow.

Automate task runs on time-driven schedules.

Use cases:
  - Download spam numbers from the FTC-DNC registry everyday.

  - Auto backup everyday and only keep the last 7 backups.
Trigger
Delay (seconds)

This feature temporarily changes the system default ringtone before ringing begins and then reverts it after %d seconds, by which time the ringing is expected to have begun.

Some phones offer features like Vibrate First Then Ring which may defer the ringing by, say, 6 seconds. In that case, increase this delay accordingly.
